entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComInterfaceGenerator uses Diagnostic in incremental pipeline, which do not compare as equal in Roslyn #86736
  • NativeAOT stripped symbol files aren't loaded automatically in MacOS+lldb #86734
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails with simple MAUI application #86727
  • Unable to TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryAsync when it contains symbolic link file points to an absolute path #86724
  • [API Proposal]: Create an AsnReader from an AsnReader #86723
    Future
  • ILLink Trim Analyzer not warning for TryAddSingleton #86720
    8.0.0
  • Frozen Collection Follow-up: Items/Keys/Values properties #86719
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient may retry non-idempotent requests on gracefully closed connections #86714
  • Regression in .NET 8.0-preview.5: dependent assembly is not included in TPA list when running fxdependent pwsh build with preview.5 dotnet.exe #86713
  • JIT: Handle liveness for defined retbufs in physical promotion #86711
    Future
  • [wasm][jiterpreter] memory access out of bounds when running with Profiled AOT + Jiterpreter #86710
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT produces very large `__LINKEDIT` segment on macOS #86707
  • Simple .NET 7 Api is using more than 1.5Gigs of memory for Apple Mac Mini Arm 64 processor #86703
  • Topological Sort in S.T.J source generator not correct #86702
    8.0.0
  • QUIC Listener ConnectionOptionsCallback ALPN Narrowing Down Failure with Wrong Error Code #86701
    8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement collation native functions #86699
  • DefaultMeterFactory.Create and MeterOptions.Scope #86684
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recognized internal namespace #86682
  • support file block copy on write on Windows #86681
    8.0.0

Closed

  • COM interface derivation chain for 3+ interfaces doesn't generate shadowing and vtables correctly #86662
    8.0.0
  • ReadOnlySequence GetPosition does not respect slice boundaries #86509
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not support by-value In and Out attributes for unmanaged-to-managed stubs #86608
  • PreserializedResourceWriterTests.TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration test failure #86013
    8.0.0
  • UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping escapes too much #86463
  • UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests fail on some Mono runtimes #69823
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Further optimizations for dedup improvement #83973
    8.0.0
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Boolean.TryParse #78408
  • [wasm] System.Memory tests failing with AOT running on V8 - `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` at `corlib_wrapper_delegate_invoke_System_Func_2_T_REF_TResult_REF_invoke_callvirt_TResult_T_T_REF ` #86621
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Avoid generating rgctx fetch trampolines in generic sharing #82906
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tracking: iOS - Size reduction #61815
    8.0.0
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: many more corelib symbols are materialized/AOT compiled in netcore compared to legacy Mono #56385
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Cryptography, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3 a' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified. #86693
  • MakeGenericXXX apis don't check for function pointers #86628
    8.0.0
  • Remove GT_ASG nodes #10873
    Future
  • ValueTaskSourceAsTask IAsyncStateMachineBox implementation? #77866
    Future
  • CA1861 skip cases where the array is mutated later #86414
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Define the managed dependencies of the crossgen-corelib.proj file through ProjectReferences #86735
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2187689 #86733
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add some more testing around shadowing, inheritance, and project boundaries. #86732
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Fix StringMarshalling error message and actually copy attributes from methods to shadows #86731
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make helix-inner-step send job warnaserror the same between windows and non-windows platforms #86729
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expand CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTANY cast #86728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [WIP][Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add IsEmpty and Length properties to System.BinaryData #86721
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #86717
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add adjacency row length check in System.Text.Json Topological Sort #86716
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Update NativeAot with latest ILLink changes #86712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [mono][wasm] Fix support for virtual invokes. #86709
    Servicing-approved
  • [7.0] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86708
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Have physical promotion insert read backs before possible implicit control flow #86706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ISA outerloop tests #86705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization unblocking APIs that became supported. #86694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use globalization invariant mode + prefer speed for AOT compilers #86691
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: specify BaseOS for the unknown rid build. #86688
    blocked, community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Only build specific tracing tests for NativeAOT leg #86697
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Exports cleanup #86718
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement byval-out marshalling for unmanaged->managed #86666
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix timeouts in resourcemanager test #86680
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Use the BannedApiAnalyzer instead of the LinqPoison mechanism to ban Linq in the managed type system #86673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary closure in ServiceProviderEngineScope.CaptureDisposable #86683
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete native AOT interop doc #86704
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Print detailed comments for emitIns_R_AI in asm (targeting NativeAOT) #86677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation in Activity.{Parent}Id #86685
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Unify Roslyn testing SDK version across the repo #86669
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Added float32 support and implemented all R4 opcodes #86092
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][wasm] Fix support for virtual invokes. #86687
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix MakeGenericType/Method argument validation for function pointers #86686
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Follow related intervals for single-reg LIR temp intervals #86632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a bug in type hierarchy marking in the trimmer #86635
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • add nuget.projectmodel to version.details #86650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization

Updated

  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add `DiagnosticOr<T>` type for gracefully handling failures in incremental generator transformations #86603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Handle event pipe environment variable configuration and output to file #86656
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Adjust physical promotion heuristics #86660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Bump main version to Preview 6 #86675
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `u8` literals in `ManagedTextSection`. #86657
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix crashing bug in StringDecoder.decode when accessing SharedArrayBuffer from different JavaScript realm #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [browser] threads & js cleanup #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add a simple store-forwarding optimization for structs returned in registers #86388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Preference LIR edges away from killed registers #81242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Meta
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Read public GC options if available #86068

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Temporary exclude infinite tests. #86515
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Restore and build (publish) fail on docker ARM64 #32781

Closed

  • "dotnet -h" throwing segfault #14473
  • PublishSingleFile alter deps.json or contents as part of PostBuildEvent before compressing the single .exe #14327
  • Should _CheckForInvalidTargetPlatformVersion look at the moniker instead of the version only? #14165
  • Windows Container nanoserver:1809 errors out with self-contained ASP.NET 5 app #13784

PullRequests

Created

  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Preview 6 branding #32796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged

Merged

  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Containers: rename "Docker daemon" to "local registry". #32751
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestTypeAliases tests are failing in roslyn-ci main #68312
  • Sticky scroll doesn't work in C# when Block Structure Guides are disabled #68310
  • Suggestion to remove cast to Delegate results in warning #68307

Closed

  • EnC: support EnC while attached to multiple processes #52613
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33724.344 #68314
  • Add project id to rude edit telemetry #67113
    Next
  • IDE0270 - Ignore when throwing expression #68313
  • `unsafe` keyword is not recommended in using directives #67984
  • Record's default ToString() outputs private getter value #68309
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33723.289 #68305

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove `ValueSource<T>` type. #68311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Show `unsafe` keyword after `using` or `static` in using directive #68306
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unexercised C# binaires from VB OptProf test profiling #68302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Make ConstantTextAndVersionSource no longer a ValueSource. #68298
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishTrimmed apps #48416
  • ComponentState isn't always disposed #48411
  • Blazor WebAssembly integration with Msal.js fails fatally when changing Authority URL #48404
  • Filter Outgoing Invocations in SignalR #48401

Closed

  • Default EventSourceSupport to true in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #48247
    8.0-preview5
  • Exception calling Dispose on IJSInProcessObjectReference instance in Blazor WebAssembly #48280
    8.0-preview6
  • We have a project template where we can add support for Server and Webassembly #46395
    8.0-preview5
  • Memory leak in Health Checks #48240
  • Application using Request Delegate Generator fails to start with KeyNotFoundException #48379
  • Request Delegate Generator code counts as user code for code coverage #48376

PullRequests

Created

  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor
  • Use Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics #48403
    area-runtime
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid args #48402
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview5] Ensure ComponentState is always disposed #48410
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • [Infrastructure] Add test retries for InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly #48409
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Transitive package to provide coherency in dotnet/extensions #48398
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Use `Type.IsByRefLike`. #48351
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Ensure ComponentState is always disposed #48406
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Disable debugger support in trimming tests #48399
    needs-area-label, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Update template localization file #48405
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6
  • Add [GeneratedCode] for more RDG output #48377
    area-runtime, community-contribution, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview6
  • Update branding to preview6 #48397
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • WithOpenApi generates annotations for endpoints without MethodInfo #47346
    area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-runtime
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime
  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    area-web-frameworks
  • Revert "Skip failing template tests" #41950
    area-mvc
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-runtime
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue parsing overloads accepting IList of StringSegment #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • DOM merging #48258
    area-blazor
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    area-infrastructure
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #48364
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, 6.0.x
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts
  • DO NOT REVIEW Add a trimming test that always fails for experimental purposes #48386
    area-hosting
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2187531 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows HorizontalList CollectionView has some weird space if cells are smaller than 88 dp #15241
    .NET 8
  • WebView on iOS cann't download file #15237
  • Does MAUI support global hotkey ? #15236
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #15250
  • Scrollview on Windows doesn't measure direct child on height changed #15248
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Bump main stable versions #15247
  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
  • Improved WebUtils.ParseQueryString() #15245
  • [net7.0] Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #15244
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240
  • Set Version for Windows #15238
    backport/suggested
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15235
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Implements Color.Equal() correctly #15218
    area/drawing ✏️

Updated

  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • Use [AppendTo|PrependTo|Replace]Mapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Schema, table and column name parametrization in SqlQueryRaw #30964
  • Ef Core 8 Preview, mapping POCO Object into JSON column without OwnsOne/OwnsMany #30963

Closed

  • Analyzer: warn (and code fix) for use of interpolation in SQL methods accepting raw strings #30965
  • ValueGenerator doesn't use NextAsync for the added object by the entity relation after SaveChangesAsync #30936
  • EFCore 7 - Some JSON GIT tests removed from EFCore 7? #30899
  • Connections are not closed when the DbContext is disposed #30888
  • "7.0.5 is not compatible with net70" #30880
  • .HasComputedColumnSql does not writes data #30872
  • Configuring multiple containers with distinct partition keys to same DbContext #30829
  • Error when running EF Bundle on target server: No frameworks were found. #30823
  • EF core7 will multi resultset. #30940
  • Query: Expand Any/All on local collection into predicate with AND/OR #19070

PullRequests

Created

  • Always convert to parameter query roots in relational #30966

Merged

  • Add analyzer/codefix for usage of interpolated strings in raw query methods #30835
  • Update branding to preview6 #30962

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30952
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30951
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
